name.ja: アーマード・エクシーズ

text.en:
Target 1 face-up monster you control and 1 Xyz Monster in your GY; equip that monster from the GY to that other monster on the field as an Equip Spell with these effects.
● The equipped monster's ATK becomes this card's.
● The equipped monster's Attribute is also treated as this card's.
● If the equipped monster attacked, at the end of the Damage Step: You can send this card to the GY; the monster it was equipped to can make a second attack in a row.
